tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE disciplinary_actions (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  action_date DATE NOT NULL,
  action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE disciplinary_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_date DATE,
    employee_id INT,
    action_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_behavior (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
    behavior_date DATE,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Employee (employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  department_id INT,
  hire_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE DisciplinaryAction (action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  action_date DATE,
  action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  comments TEXT);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeBehavior (behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  behavior_date DATE,
  behavior_description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeRanking (ranking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  ranking_date DATE,
  ranking_score INT);
